lines.text: Get outta here, you hosejockey!
I remember... I was working B-Shift over at Station 10. That was a great, old station. Know why?
It had a pole?
It had a pole. A fire station just isn't a fire station without a pole.
[opening credits]
Fifty-One, informant reports toxic chemicals are stored in tanker. Use caution.
Squad Fifty-One, this is Rampart - can you send me some EKG?
10-4; transmitting EKG - we're sending you a strip, vitals to follow. Pulse is 160, the - victim is in extreme pain, Rampart.
Patient is in V-fib! Rampart, we have lost the victim's pulse! Beginning CPR! We're defibrillating victim, Rampart! Rampart, we've defibrillated victim; he's in sinus rhythm.
Administer two amps sodium bicarb and insert an airway. Start an IV, Fifty-One - lactated Ringer's.
Squad Fifty-One, continue monitoring vitals and transport immediately.
We're on our way, Rampart!
Start an IV, 51... D5W TKO!
What'd you say that I said that you said?
That your partner here is a nut.
Aha! aha, aha.
What about it?
You admit it?
That you're some kind of nut? Yeah, I said it, so what? You're a nut, but you're a friendly kind of nut.
Oh, that's a heck of a thing to say about someone you work every shift with!
Station 51, KMG365.
